item.title: Runecrafting help
item.dc:creator: @I_Am_L4w I Am L4w
item.description:
@I_Am_L4w wrote:

Chea Im using choob isle pk source by mod adam and ive been working on a better runecrafting place cuz his is kinda ghetto and i fixed everything got all the runes to the right place and the amount of runes i want each time you click on the rift… btw my new rc place is in the abyss.

?Few Questions?

  1. Some of the rune rifts dont give runes when you click on them
  2. Also when i click on the portal to go to runecraft i lose connection and then regain connection and im in the abyss

anyone have any ideas on how to fix these two errors…

[code]case 7133: // Nature rift
CraftRunesRift(“Nature”, 44, 185, 561, 56, 53, 791);
break;

case 7132: // Cosmic rift
CraftRunesRift(“Cosmic”, 30, 107, 564, 56, 53, 791);
break;

case 7141: // Blood rift
CraftRunesRift(“Ectotoken”, 70, 550, 4278, 56, 53, 791);
break;

case 7129: // Fire rift
CraftRunesRift(“Fire”, 25, 88, 554, 56, 53, 791);
break;

case 7130: // Earth rift
CraftRunesRift(“Earth”, 20, 75, 557, 56, 53, 791);
break;

case 7137: // Water rift
CraftRunesRift(“Water”, 15, 62, 555, 56, 53, 791);
break;

case 7140: // Mind rift
CraftRunesRift(“Mind”, 10, 52, 558, 56, 53, 791);
break;

case 7139: // Air rift
CraftRunesRift(“Air”, 1, 35, 556, 56, 53, 791);
break;

case 7131: // Body rift
CraftRunesRift(“Body”, 5, 7, 559, 56, 53, 791);
break;

case 7138: // Soul rift
CraftRunesRift(“Soul”, 90, 950, 566, 56, 53, 791);
break;

case 7136: // Death rift
CraftRunesRift(“Death”, 65, 350, 560, 56, 53, 791);
break;

case 7135: // Law rift
CraftRunesRift(“Law”, 55, 275, 563, 56, 53, 791);
break;

case 7134: // Chaos rift
CraftRunesRift(“Chaos”, 35, 150, 562, 56, 53, 791);
break;[/code]
